summary: AN ORDINANCE authorizing the public sale and issuance of $8,100,000 par value of water revenue bonds of the City of Seattle to provide moneys to pay the cost of additions and betterments to, and extensions of the municipal water system of the City and to redeem and pay any outstanding revenue warrants issued pursuant to Ordinance \_\_\_\_\_\_\_, providing that said bonds be issued on a parity with the outstanding water revenue bonds issued under Ordinances 87150, 88730, 90505, 91792, 100863, 106757 and 108246 and like bonds hereafter authorized.
